name: @mborne/markdown-to-html
description: Experiment static site renderer/server supporting markdown and HTML/JS views

scripts.build-demo: npm run build-demo-01 && npm run build-demo-02
scripts.build-demo-01: rm -rf demo/01-default-layout && node bin/markdown-to-html.js -m convert -l default -O demo/01-default-layout samples/01-default-layout
scripts.build-demo-02: rm -rf demo/02-remarkjs && node bin/markdown-to-html.js -m convert -l remarkjs -O demo/02-remarkjs samples/02-remarkjs
scripts.test: npm run check-style && npm run unit-test

author: Mickael Borne <mborne@users.noreply.github.com>
